name: auth-system-jwt-backend
description: Express auth jwt typescript with prisma

scripts.dev: npm run prisma:generate && cross-env NODE_ENV=development ts-node-dev --project tsconfig.dev.json -r tsconfig-paths/register --transpile-only --respawn --exit-child _app.ts
scripts.build:production: npm run prisma:generate && tsc --build tsconfig.build.json && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.json
scripts.production: npm run build:production && npm run start
scripts.prisma:generate: npm run devEnv npx prisma generate
scripts.prisma:migrate: npm run devEnv npx prisma migrate dev --name init
scripts.prisma:seed: npm run devEnv npx prisma db seed
scripts.prisma:studio: npm run devEnv npx prisma studio

author: Chysev
